channel.title: Screenshots
channel.description:
hey, i making a server and im coding and making a forums and that lot but im still confused on a few bits
one of these is how to show screenshots.... u need an url - where u get it (dont tell me to attach it as an attchment (it looks naf)
cheers[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 07:07:28 PM[/size][hr]nobody? surely some peps who have owned servers should know...

item.title: Screenshots

item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Upload it to something like imageshack.us, and get the 2nd forum link and paste it in the message.
